CustomField.description: Open this event in the OneForm CMS in order to edit the website content.
CustomField.formula: IF(OneForm_ID__c > 1, CASE(RecordTypeId, "01214000000AUym",HYPERLINK("https://cms.erepublic.com/common/webinars/edit/"&TEXT(OneForm_ID__c),"Open in CMS"), "01230000000ueur",HYPERLINK("https://cms.erepublic.com/common/custom_events/edit/"&TEXT(OneForm_ID__c),"Open in CMS"), "01230000000ueuw",HYPERLINK("https://cms.erepublic.com/common/events/edit/"&TEXT(OneForm_ID__c),"Open in CMS"), "01214000000AVlo",HYPERLINK("https://cms.erepublic.com/common/webinars/edit/"&TEXT(OneForm_ID__c),"Open in CMS") ,"Not Synced to CMS") ,"Not Synced to CMS")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Open this event in the OneForm CMS in order to edit the website content.
CustomField.label: OneForm Link
